member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LEDStrip
member.summary: An LEDStrip module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LEDStrip.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LEDStrip.SetLed(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the given LED to the given state.
member.param: The LED to change to set.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LEDStrip.SetBitmask(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Sets the LEDs on the module to the corresponding bit in the mask.
member.param: The bit mask to set the LEDs to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LEDStrip.TurnAllLedsOn
member.summary: Turns on all of the LEDs.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LEDStrip.TurnAllLedsOff
member.summary: Turns off all of the LEDs.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LEDStrip.SetLeds(System.Int32)
member.summary: Turns all of the LEDs on up until, but not including, the LED numbered by endIndex. The rest are turned off.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LEDStrip.SetPercentage(System.Double)
member.summary: Turns on the LedCount * percentage LEDs starting at LED 0.
member.param: The amount of LEDs to turn on.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LEDStrip.LedCount
member.summary: The number of LEDs on the module.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LEDStrip.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: The state of the given LED.
member.param: The LED whose state to get or set.
member.returns: Whether or not the LED is on or off.
